title: Honestly, the only thing in my opinion that makes Akali strong...
body:
Is this fucking shroud + invisibility.


Why can she re-enter invisibility during combat? It is so stupid it hurts. She could be 50 HP, and all you need is a last hit and boom she isnt hit for 0.2 seconds and invisible again and repositions herself, repeatedly.

replies.body: I thought they would remove her shroud for her rework. I cannot believe they kept the most toxic thing about her kit. (2nd was sustain)
I can't believe she can re-enter stealth so many times and especially in combat??!
